Packages
Package
Description
entities
Provides the base class Entity and its inheritors Player and Boss, both immportant classes to the role project.
entities.boss
Provides all classes needed to give contextual meaning to Bosses an its aplications.
entities.player
Provides all classes needed to give contextual meaning to a Player an its aplications.
exceptions
Fornece exceções contextuais necessárias para parar o programa assim que elas são ativadas devido ao seu contexto.
game
Provides the classes to set the game and the game logic.
interfaces
Provides interfaces to padronize code development so certain classes can have some methods that acts in the same pattern or way.
items
Fornece classes para gerenciar e usar todos os tipos de itens no jogo (armas, armaduras, consumíveis, etc.)
items.armor
Fornece classes para criar e gerenciar armaduras ou vestíveis.
items.consumable
Fornece classes para criar e gerenciar consumíveis ou qualquer coisa usável.
items.weapon
Fornece classes para criar e gerenciar as armas.
scene
Provides classes to create and manage the game scene or windows as well as draw all its components.
scene.bars
 
scene.button
Provides classes to work with Buttons on the game.
scene.inventory
 
scene.statbox
 
scene.textbox
 
utils
Fornece funções úteis que podem ser usadas em todas as classes do projeto.
